type: Legendary Artifact Creature – Construct Cleric Knight
rules_text:
When Marro, Inquisition Leader enters, each opponent exiles a card from their hand and puts a inquisitor counter on it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.
At the beginning of each end step, if a historic spell was cast this turn, exile Marro, then return it to the battlefield. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
